backend/main.mo: Defines user profiles, shops, updates, notifications, and related sorting utilities with state maps and an upgrade hook that expires outdated shop updates.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short summaries of various frontend source files describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining CSS variables for light and dark themes and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing root div and script loader for the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the app’s routing with protected pages, root layout logic, and integration of the MobileAppShell.
frontend/src/BUZZ_DESIGN_SYSTEM.md: Documentation outlining the LocalBuzz design system including colors, typography, layout, and component guidelines.
frontend/src/components/AppBackButton.ts: Reusable back button component using app navigation hook to provide safe in-app back navigation.
frontend/src/components/LocationStatusCa: Renders different location permission states with actions to request or refresh location and shows errors or coordinates.
frontend/src/components/MobileAppShell.t: Provides app layout with header, content area, logout handling, and bottom navigation based on current route.
frontend/src/components/OtpLoginCard.tsx: Handles phone-based OTP login flow including requesting, verifying, resending OTP, and displaying errors.
frontend/src/components/ShopOpenClosedTo: Simple toggle UI allowing a shop to switch between open and closed states.
frontend/src/components/ShopUpdatePostCa: Displays a shop update post with category, distance, optional image, expiry status, and favorite button support.
frontend/src/constants/shopCategories.ts: Exports the canonical list of shop categories and its associated type.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to identity changes and invalidates dependent queries when updated.
Provides safe back-navigation logic with fallbacks based on authentication state.
React Query hooks to fetch, favorite, and unfavorite shops, including cache invalidation and favorited checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomerHomeFeed.t: Fetches nearby active shop updates, computes distances, sorts them, and optionally filters by category.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavoriteShopNotifi: Retrieves updates from favorited shops outside the normal feed radius but within 10km for notification purposes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handles AuthClient creation, login, logout, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocationPermission: Manages browser location permission state and retrieves current coordinates with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotificationPermis: Tracks browser notification permission status and provides a method to request permission.
frontend/src/hooks/useOtpChallenge.ts: Provides mutations to request an OTP challenge and verify an OTP code via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useOtpSession.ts: Stores and manages OTP verification state and phone number in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/usePersistLastKnownLo: Persists the user's last known location to the backend when identity and coordinates are available.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains various user, location, and notification React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data.
frontend/src/hooks/useShop.ts: Provides shop-related queries and mutations, including fetching, registering, updating, and setting shop status.
frontend/src/hooks/useShopUpdateNotifica: Handles pending shop-update notifications by showing browser alerts and acknowledging them to avoid duplicates.
frontend/src/hooks/useShopUpdates.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch, create, update, and delete shop updates tied to the current owner’s shop.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes, layout rules, and custom scrollbar styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
Renders the customer feed with location-based shop updates, category filters, favorites, search, and notification opt-in.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerProfilePage.t: Shows the customer profile with a list of favorite shops and allows removing favorites.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Implements login flow using Internet Identity and OTP verification before routing to role selection.
frontend/src/pages/RoleSelectionPage.tsx: Displays role selection, handles OTP session checks, saves user role, and redirects based on stored preferences.
frontend/src/pages/ShopDashboardPage.tsx: Shows shop info, active/expired updates, and provides actions for registration, posting updates, and toggling shop status.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPostUpdatePage.ts: Form for creating shop updates with image upload, expiry selection, validation, and submission handling.
Handles shop registration or editing with form fields, image upload, validation, and submit logic.
Displays detailed view of a shop update with status, image, shop info, and handles loading and missing-update cases.
frontend/src/utils/geo.ts: Provides distance calculation, formatting, and radius checking utilities using the Haversine formula.
frontend/src/utils/notificationStorage.t: Utilities for storing notification opt-in state, timestamps, notified IDs, and per-shop daily counts in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/phoneNumber.ts: Validates and normalizes Indian phone numbers to E.164 format and formats them for display.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Helpers for converting between JS dates and backend nanosecond timestamps and checking/formatting expiry times.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, layout settings, custom animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current state, issues, and existing features related to fixing the search input.
